translations.translation: Your report has reached us. Thank you!

translations.label: warning_static_content_cache_system
translations.translation: Static content cache system is for records (categories, custom fields, language translations etc.) that do not change much on the site. The cache files will be refreshed automatically when there is a change in these records. It is recommended to activate this system always for a faster site.

translations.label: warning_plan_used
translations.translation: This plan has been used before

translations.translation: Admin role does not require a membership plan.

translations.translation: The order has not yet been shipped.

translations.translation: You can add the order tracking code and link while changing the order status.

translations.label: license_keys_system_exp
translations.translation: Add all your license keys from here. The system will automatically give a license key to each buyer.

translations.label: shipping_classes_exp
translations.translation: Shipping classes allow you to define different shipping costs for your products. If you have products with high shipping costs (large in weight and size), you can add a class from here and set a different price for each shipping method for this class. You can choose shipping classes during adding your products.

translations.label: product_does_not_ship_location
translations.translation: This product does not ship to this location.

translations.label: bank_accounts_exp
translations.translation: You can make your payment to one of these bank accounts.

translations.label: form_validation_min_length
translations.translation: The {field} field must be at least {param} characters in length.

translations.label: form_validation_max_length
translations.translation: The {field} field cannot exceed {param} characters in length.

translations.label: form_validation_matches
translations.translation: The {field} field does not match the {param} field.

translations.label: form_validation_is_unique
translations.translation: The {field} field must contain a unique value.
